column1: Natural logarithm with golden ratio scaling
Rank 1: Unlock with perk point (base +5% effectiveness)
Rank 2-5: Earn through USE (each rank +5% max +25% at Rank 5)
Progress to Rank 4: Need 3000 hits with one-handed weapons
- Min-maxing (few skills high variance stats) = Lower luck
Affected by: Number of different skills with points + stat balance
Not affected by: Total points allocated or skill levels
Shows how stat gains diminish at higher skill levels
Notice: First 25 points give 32.6 stat (70% of max)
Next 75 points only give 13.6 stat (30% of max)
This encourages broad skill investment over min-maxing
- Gain character XP from quests discoveries kills etc.
- Level up when XP threshold reached
- Each level: +15 skill points +5 HP +3 SP
- Every 5 levels: Choose bonus (+50 HP/SP OR +1 perk)
2. Allocate skill points to skills (column B rows 16-35)
3. Stats auto-calculate in DERIVED STATS section
4. Resource pools auto-calculate in RESOURCE POOLS section
5. Track perk progression in PERK ALLOCATION section
6. Plan Destiny perks in DESTINY PERKS section
✓ New coefficients: Major (10) Greater (6.18) Lesser (3.82) Minor (2.36)
✓ Diminishing returns: Early skill points matter most
